name: discovery
description: Analyze new feature requests and map the affected codebase areas
steps: Parse Request: Extract domain keywords and identify affected subsystems
Tiered Scan: Read T2 Architecture, T3 Protocol, T4 History for relevant context
Dependency Map: Query `knowledge-graph.md` and build adjacency matrix
Entry Point Identification: Locate primary service/component and public API facade
Constraint Extraction: List safeguards that apply and note Critical Invariant Markers
